kocur.lina.bot

Class LayeredBotContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.agent.AgentContext
      • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.influence.ExtendedAgentContext
        • kocur.lina.bot.LayeredBotContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    cz.cuni.mff.kocur.events.FrameworkEventListener

    public class LayeredBotContext
extends ExtendedAgentContext
    Class that extends Agent's context and creates a context, that contains influence map layers.
    Author:
    kocur
